com.ad4screen.sdk

Class Log

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ad4screen.sdk.Log

  • public final class Log
extends java.lang.Object
    Ad4Screen central logging facility.
    With this API you can enable or disable Ad4Screen output to ease debugging while developping your app.
    Important as this class is a singleton, there is one instance per process (=JVM).
    If you wish to see Ad4Screen Service process output, you will have to enable logging from your Application class in correct process.
    See Also:
    A4SApplication, A4S.isInA4SProcess
